  • Typography

Typography

Headings

All HTML headings, <h1> through <h6>, are available. .h1 through .h6 classes are also available, for when you want to match the font styling of a heading but still want your text to be displayed inline.

H5

Body copy

Body copy is used as the standard text size and treatment throughout the user interface. Most components use the body copy style by default, with some exceptions being titles, headings and labels.
